body:
This bug jumps to a solution instead of addressing the problem.

I propose this be discussed on a mailing list instead (see https://golan.org/wiki/Questions), or a bug be filed discussing whatever's not possible or not working correctly with the package.

Messing with the guts of ssh type internals doesn't seem desirable on its own.

I don't know why I'd want `func (s *Session) SetChannel(ch Channel) {`, especially because your proposal comes with no docs.
